item.title: Dave add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "True love is delicate and kind, full of gentle perception and understanding, full of beauty and grace, full of joy unutterable. There should be some flavor of this in all our love for others. We are all one. We are one flesh in the Mystical Body as man and woman are said to be one flesh in marriage. With such a love one would see all things new; we would begin to see people as they really are, as God sees them." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Dave add a quote by Dorothy Day
item.description: "Life itself is a haphazard, untidy, messy affair." -- Dorothy Day

item.title: Dave add a quote by Meister Eckhart
item.description: "Some people prefer solitude. They say their peace of mind depends on this. Others say they would be better off in church. If you do well, you do well wherever you are. If you fail, you fail wherever you are. Your surroundings don't matter. God is with you everywhere -- in the market place as well as in seclusion or in the church. If you look for nothing but God, nothing or no one can disturb you. God is not distracted by a multitude of things. Nor can we be." -- Meister Eckhart
